trans-unit.source: Manages a list of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Gere uma lista de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The CurrencyManager derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
trans-unit.target: O CurrencyManager deriva da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> to return either a CurrencyManager or a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>para devolver um CurrencyManager ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>

trans-unit.source: The actual object returned depends on the data source and data member passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.
trans-unit.target: O objecto real devolvido depende o membro de dados e origem de dados foi transmitido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the data source is an object that can return only a single property (instead of a list of objects), the type will be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.
trans-unit.target: Se a origem de dados é um objeto que pode devolver apenas uma única propriedade (em vez de uma lista de objetos), o tipo de será <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> as the data source, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se especificar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>como origem de dados, uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>vai ser devolvido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: If, on the other hand, the data source is an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>, or <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface, a CurrencyManager will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Se, por outro lado, a origem de dados é um objeto que implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IList>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>, ou <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>interface, vai ser devolvido um CurrencyManager.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Current%2A> property returns the current item in the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Current%2A>propriedade devolve o item atual na lista subjacente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change the current item, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> property to a new value.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar o item atual, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A>propriedade para um novo valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value must be greater than 0 and must be less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor tem de ser maior que 0 e tem de ser inferior ao valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Count%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the underlying data source implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface, and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A> property is set to `true`, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.AddNew%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se a origem de dados subjacentes implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>interface e o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`, pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.AddNew%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.AddNew%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: Adds a new item to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um novo item à lista subjacente.

trans-unit.source: This method is supported only if the data source implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface and the data source allows adding rows (<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A> is `true`).
trans-unit.target: Este método só é suportado se a origem de dados implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>interface e a origem de dados permite adicionar linhas (<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A> é `true`).</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property was designed to allow complex-bound controls, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control, to add new items to list.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Esta propriedade foi concebida para permitir que os controlos vinculados a complexas, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>controlo, para adicionar novos itens de lista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: You typically use this property only if you are creating your own control that incorporates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, utilizar esta propriedade apenas se estiver a criar o seus próprios controlo que incorpora o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, to add items if the data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataView>, use the <xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method of the <xref:System.Data.DataView> class.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário adicionar os itens se a origem de dados é um <xref:System.Data.DataView>Utilize o <xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método de <xref:System.Data.DataView>classe.</xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataView>

trans-unit.source: If the data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, use the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A> method and add the row to the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Se a origem de dados é um <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, utilize o <xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A>método e adicione a linha ao <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>.</xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The underlying data source does not implement <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"></xref>, or the data source has thrown an exception because the user has attempted to add a row to a read-only or fixed-size <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A origem de dados subjacente não implementa <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"> </xref>, ou a origem de dados accionou uma excepção porque o utilizador tentou adicionar uma linha de uma só de leitura ou de tamanho fixo <xref href="System.Data.DataView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the current edit operation.
trans-unit.target: Cancela a operação de edição atual.

trans-unit.source: This method is supported only if the objects contained by the data source implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: Este método só é suportado se os objetos contidos pela origem de dados implementam o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>

trans-unit.source: If the objects contained within the data source do not implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> interface, changes made to the data will not be discarded.
trans-unit.target: Se os objetos contidos na origem de dados não implementam a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>interface, as alterações efetuadas aos dados não será rejeitada.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property was designed to be used by complex data-bound controls, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control, to cancel edits.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Esta propriedade foi concebida para ser utilizado pelos controlos vinculados a dados complexos, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>controlo, para cancelar as edições.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: For example, when the user presses the ESC key, the CancelCurrentEdit method is called on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando o utilizador premir a tecla ESC, o método de CancelCurrentEdit é chamado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: Unless you are creating a control that requires this same functionality, you should not use this method.
trans-unit.target: A menos que estiver a criar um controlo que requer esta mesma funcionalidade, não deve utilizar este método.

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.Data.DataRowView.CancelEdit%2A> method of the <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> class.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, utilize o <xref:System.Data.DataRowView.CancelEdit%2A>método de <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>classe.</xref:System.Data.DataRowView> </xref:System.Data.DataRowView.CancelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Throws an exception if there is no list, or the list is empty.
trans-unit.target: Emite uma exceção se não existe nenhuma lista ou a lista está vazia.

trans-unit.source: There is no list, or the list is empty.
trans-unit.target: Não existe nenhuma lista ou a lista está vazia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the list.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de itens na lista.

trans-unit.source: Use the count property to determine when the end of a list has been reached.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade contagem para determinar quando foi atingido o fim de uma lista.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> maintains a 0-based array of items, the end of the list is always Count minus one.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>mantém uma matriz de acesso baseado em 0 de itens, o fim da lista é sempre contagem menos um.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the list.
trans-unit.target: O número de itens na lista.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current item in the list.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o item atual na lista.

trans-unit.source: In order to get the current item, you must know its data type in order to cast it correctly.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o item atual, tem de saber o respetivo tipo de dados para transmitir corretamente.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataView> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, you must cast the current item as a <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> object.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se a origem de dados é um <xref:System.Data.DataView>ou <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, tem de o transmitir o item atual como um <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>objeto.</xref:System.Data.DataRowView> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataView>

trans-unit.source: A list item of type <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Um item da lista de tipo <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Ends the current edit operation.
trans-unit.target: Termina a operação de edição atual.

trans-unit.source: This method is supported only if the objects contained by the data source implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICancelAddNew> interfaces.
trans-unit.target: Este método só é suportado se os objetos contidos pela origem de dados implementam o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>ou <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICancelAddNew>interfaces.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICancelAddNew> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property was designed to be used by complex data-bound controls, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Esta propriedade foi concebida para ser utilizado pelos controlos vinculados a dados complexos, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Unless you are creating a control that requires this same functionality, you should not use this method.
trans-unit.target: A menos que estiver a criar um controlo que requer esta mesma funcionalidade, não deve utilizar este método.

trans-unit.source: Instead, if the data source is either a <xref:System.Data.DataView> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, use the <xref:System.Data.DataRowView.EndEdit%2A> method of the <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> class.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, se a origem de dados é um um <xref:System.Data.DataView>ou <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, utilize o <xref:System.Data.DataRowView.EndEdit%2A>método de <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>classe.</xref:System.Data.DataRowView> </xref:System.Data.DataRowView.EndEdit%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataView>

trans-unit.source: Specifies the data type of the list.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o tipo de dados da lista.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the property descriptor collection for the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de descritor de propriedade para a lista subjacente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> is used to specify a column in the list.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>é utilizada para especificar uma coluna na lista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> for the list.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref> para obter a lista.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the list supplying the data for the binding using the specified set of bound properties.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome da lista de fornecer os dados para o enlace com o conjunto de propriedades vinculadas especificados.

trans-unit.source: For the GetListName method to be successful, the underlying list must be of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList>.
trans-unit.target: Para o método GetListName seja concluída com êxito, a lista subjacente tem de ser do tipo <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> of properties to be found in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref> das propriedades para ser encontrada na origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: If successful, a <xref:System.String> containing name of the list supplying the data for the binding; otherwise, an <xref:System.String> string.
trans-unit.target: Se tiver êxito, um <xref:System.String>que contém o nome da lista de fornecer os dados para o enlace; caso contrário, um <xref:System.String>cadeia.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current item has been altered.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o item atual foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: The ItemChanged event will occur when the user calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.ResumeBinding%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.SuspendBinding%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O evento ItemChanged irá ocorrer quando o utilizador chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.ResumeBinding%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.SuspendBinding%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.SuspendBinding%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.ResumeBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ItemChanged event occurs only when the item itself has been changed in some manner.
trans-unit.target: O evento ItemChanged ocorre apenas quando o próprio item foi alterado de alguma forma.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the value of an item is changed from 10 to 42, the event will occur.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o valor de um item é alterado de 10 42, o evento ocorrerá.

trans-unit.source: This should not be confused with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.PositionChanged> event where the item has been changed to a new item.
trans-unit.target: Não deve ser confundido com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.PositionChanged>eventos em que o item foi alterado para um novo item.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.PositionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The event will also occur if the underlying data changes.
trans-unit.target: O evento também ocorrerá se os dados subjacentes é alterado.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you change the value of a <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>, the ItemChanged event will occur.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se alterar o valor de um <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>, ocorrerá o evento ItemChanged.</xref:System.Data.DataRowView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are creating your own control that uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, you should use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged?displayProperty=fullName> instead of the ItemChanged event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se estiver a criar o seus próprios controlo que utiliza o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, deve utilizar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged?displayProperty=fullName>em vez do evento ItemChanged.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs> enables you to determine the type of action that has occurred.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs>permite-lhe determinar o tipo de ação que tenha ocorrido.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list for this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista para este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object returned by the List property can be cast to any type that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: O objeto devolvido pela propriedade lista pode ser convertido para qualquer tipo que implemente o <xref:System.Collections.IList>interface.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: This will be commonly used when you know the type of the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: Este será normalmente utilizado quando sabe que o tipo da lista subjacente.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are data-bound to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, the underlying list is a <xref:System.Data.DataView> (which implements <xref:System.Collections.IList>).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se de que está vinculados a dados para um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, a lista subjacente é um <xref:System.Data.DataView>(que implementa <xref:System.Collections.IList>).</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: Other classes that implement the interface (this is not a complete list) include <xref:System.Array>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, and <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>.
trans-unit.target: Incluem outras classes que implementem a interface (não é uma lista completa) <xref:System.Array>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>e <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: How you use the List property depends on the class that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: Como utilizar a propriedade de lista depende a classe que implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IList>interface.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the List property to determine the name of the list.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode utilizar a propriedade de lista para determinar o nome da lista.

trans-unit.source: If the data source implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList> interface, you can use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetListName%2A> method to return the name of the current table.
trans-unit.target: Se a origem de dados implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList>interface, pode utilizar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetListName%2A>método para devolver o nome da tabela atual.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetListName%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList>

trans-unit.source: This is shown in the C# code below: ```c# private void PrintCurrentListName(DataGrid myDataGrid){ CurrencyManager myCM = (CurrencyManager) BindingContext[myDataGrid.DataSource, myDataGrid.DataMember]; IList myList = myCM.List; ITypedList thisList = (ITypedList) myList; Console.WriteLine(thisList.GetListName(null)); } ```
trans-unit.target: É mostrado no código c# abaixo:```c# private void PrintCurrentListName(DataGrid myDataGrid){ CurrencyManager myCM = (CurrencyManager) BindingContext[myDataGrid.DataSource, myDataGrid.DataMember]; IList myList = myCM.List; ITypedList thisList = (ITypedList) myList; Console.WriteLine(thisList.GetListName(null)); } ```

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IList> that contains the list.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IList>que contém a lista.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the list changes or an item in the list changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando as alterações de lista ou um item na lista de alterações.

trans-unit.source: The ListChanged event is thrown by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> class when changes to an item are made using methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.EndCurrentEdit%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Refresh%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O evento ListChanged é emitido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>quando são efetuadas alterações a um item, tal como a utilização de métodos de classe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.EndCurrentEdit%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Refresh%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Refresh%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.EndCurrentEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: This event can also occur when the data source is edited directly if it implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> interface.
trans-unit.target: Este evento também pode ocorrer quando a origem de dados é editada diretamente se implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>

trans-unit.source: The associated `OnListChanged` method is a private method in this class.
trans-unit.target: Associada `OnListChanged` método é um método privado desta classe.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the current position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> in the list.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a posição atual do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> na lista.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count%2A> property is greater than 0, the listposition field is a number between 0 and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count%2A> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count%2A>propriedade é maior que 0, o campo de listposition é um número entre 0 e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count%2A>menos 1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count%2A> is 0, listposition is -1.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count%2A>é 0, listposition -1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the metadata of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.List*> has changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando os metadados do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.List*>foi alterada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.List*>

trans-unit.source: The metadata of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.List%2A> consists of the schema of the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Os metadados do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.List%2A>consiste o esquema de subjacente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: The MetaDataChanged event is raised when that schema has changed.
trans-unit.target: O evento de MetaDataChanged é gerado quando o esquema dessa foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: For example, the MetaDataChanged event is raised when a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> is programmatically added to a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o evento de MetaDataChanged é gerado quando um <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>programaticamente é adicionado à <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.CurrentChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.CurrentChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.CurrentItemChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.CurrentItemChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ItemChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ItemChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnItemChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnItemChanged também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem ligação de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ItemChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ItemChangedEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.MetaDataChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.MetaDataChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnMetaDataChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnMetaDataChanged também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem ligação de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.PositionChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.PositionChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnPositionChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnPositionChanged também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem ligação de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position you are at within the list.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a posição que tenham dentro da lista.

trans-unit.source: An important property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> class is the Position property.
trans-unit.target: Uma propriedade de importante a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>classe é a propriedade Position.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: In a list of items, you can view only one item out of the entire list.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de itens, pode ver apenas um item fora a lista completa.

trans-unit.source: To determine which item is viewed, set the Position to a number between 0 (the beginning of the list) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count%2A> minus 1 (the end of the list).
trans-unit.target: Para determinar qual o item for visualizado, definir a posição para um número entre 0 (o início da lista) e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count%2A>menos 1 (o fim da lista).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the Position determines the currency, or place in the list, of all controls bound to the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, a posição determina a moeda ou local na lista, de todos os controlos vinculados ao mesmo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: For example, imagine a list consisting of two columns called "FirstName" and "LastName".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, imagine uma lista constituídas por duas colunas chamadas "FirstName" e "LastName".

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls are bound to the same list; the first control is bound to the first column, and the second control is bound to the second column.
trans-unit.target: Dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controlos estão associados à mesma lista; o primeiro controlo está vinculado a primeira coluna e o segundo controlo está vinculado a segunda coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: When the Position of the common <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> is set to the third position, both controls display the appropriate values for that position in the list.
trans-unit.target: Quando a posição do comuns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>está definido para a posição terceira, ambos os controlos apresentam os valores adequados nessa posição na lista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: In other words, if the item at position three consists of the first name "John" and the last name "Smith", the bound controls will display "John" and "Smith".
trans-unit.target: Por outras palavras, se o item na posição três é constituído pelo nome próprio "João" e o apelido "Santos", os controlos vinculados apresentará "João" e "Santos".

trans-unit.source: A number between 0 and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count*> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: Um número entre 0 e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count*>menos 1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.Count*>

trans-unit.source: Forces a repopulation of the data-bound list.
trans-unit.target: Força uma repopulation da lista vinculados a dados.

trans-unit.source: Use the Refresh method when the data source does not support notification when it is changed (for example, if it is an <xref:System.Array>).
trans-unit.target: Utilize o método de atualização quando a origem de dados não suportar a notificação quando é alterado (por exemplo, se for um <xref:System.Array>).</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: Removes the item at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Remove o item no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The RemoveAt method was designed to allow complex controls, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control, to remove items from the list.
trans-unit.target: O método do RemoveAt foi concebido para permitir controlos complexos, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>controlo, para remover itens da lista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: You should not use this method to actually remove items.
trans-unit.target: Não deve utilizar este método para, efetivamente, remover itens.

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.Data.DataView.Delete%2A> method of the <xref:System.Data.DataView> class to delete items.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, utilize o <xref:System.Data.DataView.Delete%2A>método do <xref:System.Data.DataView>classe eliminar itens.</xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataView.Delete%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to remove from the list.
trans-unit.target: O índice do item a remover da lista.

trans-unit.source: There is no row at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Não há nenhuma linha a determinada index .

trans-unit.source: Resumes data binding.
trans-unit.target: Retoma o enlace de dados.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.SuspendBinding%2A> and ResumeBinding are two methods that allow the temporary suspension and resumption of in a simple data binding scenario.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.SuspendBinding%2A>e ResumeBinding dois métodos que permitem que a suspensão temporário e recomeço de um cenário de enlace de dados simples.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.SuspendBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: You would typically suspend data binding if the user must be allowed to make several edits to data fields before validation occurs.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, seria suspender o enlace de dados se o utilizador tem permissão para efetuar várias edições aos campos de dados antes de ocorre a validação.

trans-unit.source: For example, if one field must be changed in accordance with a second, but where validating the first field would cause the second field to be in error.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um campo tem de ser alterado de acordo com um segundo, mas em que a validar o primeiro campo fará com que o campo segundo estar num erro.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.SuspendBinding%2A> prevents changes from being pushed into the data source until ResumeBinding is called but does not prevent changes in the data source from affecting the bound controls.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.SuspendBinding%2A>impede que as alterações que está a ser enviado para a origem de dados até ResumeBinding é chamado, mas não impede que as alterações da origem de dados que afetam os controlos vinculados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.SuspendBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Controls that use complex data binding, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, update their values based on change events such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Controlos que utilizam o enlace de dados complexas, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlar, atualize os respetivos valores com base em eventos de alteração, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method will not prevent these events from occurring.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método não impedirá que estes eventos ocorra.

trans-unit.source: For this reason, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.SuspendBinding%2A> and ResumeBinding are designed for use with simple-bound controls, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Por este motivo, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.SuspendBinding%2A>e ResumeBinding foram concebidas para utilização com controlos vinculados a simples, tais como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.SuspendBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use these methods in a complex binding scenario if you suppress <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> events by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, pode utilizar estes métodos de um cenário de enlace complexas se pode suprimir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>eventos definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: Suspends data binding to prevents changes from updating the bound data source.
trans-unit.target: Suspende o enlace de dados para impede que as alterações ao atualizar a origem de dados vinculados.

trans-unit.source: The SuspendBinding and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A> methods allow the temporary suspension and resumption of data binding in a simple binding scenario.
trans-unit.target: O SuspendBinding e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A>métodos permitem que o suspensão temporário e recomeço do enlace de dados de um cenário simples de enlace.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: You would typically suspend data binding if the user must make several edits to data fields before validation occurs.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, seria suspender o enlace de dados se o utilizador tem de se várias edições para campos de dados antes de ocorre a validação.

trans-unit.source: For example, if one field must be changed in accordance with a second, but where validating the first field would cause the second field to be in error.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um campo tem de ser alterado de acordo com um segundo, mas em que a validar o primeiro campo fará com que o campo segundo estar num erro.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A> prevents changes from being applied to the data source until <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A> is called, but does not actually prevent any events from occurring.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>impede que as alterações que está a ser aplicada à origem de dados até <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A>é chamado, mas não, na verdade, impedir que os eventos ocorram.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Controls that use complex data binding, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, update their values based on change events, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Controlos que utilizam o enlace de dados complexas, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlar, atualize os respetivos valores com base em eventos de alteração, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A> will not prevent complex-bound controls from receiving events to update the data source.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>não impedirá o controlos vinculados a complexo de receção de eventos para atualizar a origem de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: For this reason, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A> are designed for use with simple-bound controls, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Por este motivo, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A>foram concebidos para utilização com controlos vinculados a simples, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use these methods in a complex binding scenario if you suppress <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> events by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, pode utilizar estes métodos de um cenário de enlace complexas se pode suprimir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>eventos definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: Updates the status of the binding.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza o estado do enlace.
